One Sentence Summary
ðŸ–‹
To understand yourself, do the big five personality test, and follow this shadow work guide
Cover from Nik Shuliahin on Unsplash
Trustworthy Sources
The School Of Life
Founded by Psychologist Alain de Botton, The School of Life offers insightful resources on understanding yourself using psychology research
Home
The School of Life is a global organisation helping people to lead more fulfilled lives. It is a resource for helping us understand ourselves, for improving our relationships, our careers and our social lives - as well as for helping us find calm and get more out of our leisure hours.
https://www.theschooloflife.com/
Youtube Channel
How To Know Yourself
One of the hardest things in the universe to understand is the interior of our own minds: we can have spent decades on the earth before we've grasped even very basic things about who we are and how we function. It's not for nothing that the Ancient Greeks felt philosophy had only one command: Know yourself!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4lTbWQ8zD3w
Knowing Ourselves Intellectually vs. Knowing Ourselves Emotionally
It's obviously a great idea to try to understand ourselves, but one of the further distinctions we need to make is between knowing ourselves intellectually and knowing ourselves emotionally. The latter variety of knowledge is rather harder but a good deal more valuable as well.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w1Sj6rOdo_E
The Book of Life
Brief high value writing on self-knowledge
The Book of Life
chapter 3. Self-Knowledge The School of Life has produced 500 films and written 5 million words. This is an enormous problem. To stand any hope of remaining in anyone's mind, ideas - even very good ideas - need to be brief and reduced to an essence. That's why, for the sake of our...
https://www.theschooloflife.com/thebookoflife/
UnderstandMyself
Founded by Psychologist Professor Jordan Peterson, Undestandmyself uses the most experimentally backed personality model, the big five
What You Need to Know
The specialized, personalized report you will receive after completing the understandmyself.com process will help you understand your personality in great detail, and aid you substantially in your understanding of others.
https://www.understandmyself.com/
Free version:
IPIP NEO-PI, Introductory Information
https://www.personal.psu.edu/~j5j/IPIP/
Videos
20 Minutes on UnderstandMyself.com
https://www.understandmyself.com https://www.selfauthoring.com This video describes a personality assessment and reporting system we have been working on for several years. We launched it this week.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4IdzC6mJzLA
UNDERSTANDING YOURSELF Jordan Peterson (JRE877)
Jordan Peterson presents an excellent way for you to understand yourself and be free from the ghosts and pain of the past. This clip was taken from the Joe Rogan Experience #877.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fM3hXj6HtYs
Dissects the different factors
Dr. Todd Grande
Dr. Todd L. Grande covers topics related to Counselor Education and Supervision including but not limited to mental health, human behavior, psychopathology, personality theory, research, statistics, SPSS, Excel, APA style, appraisal, and group counseling. Disclaimer: The channel is for informational purposes only.
https://www.youtube.com/user/RioGrande51/search?query=big+five
Shadow Work
The shadow is a psychological term for everything we canâ€™t see in ourselves, but this guide contains succinct exercises to help you discover your shadow.
Shadow Work: A Complete Guide to Getting to Know Your Darker Half
OVERVIEW: This guide explores the nature of the shadow and provides tips and exercises for daily shadow work. ______________ It's always standing right behind us, just out of view. In any direct light, we cast a shadow. The shadow is a psychological term for everything we can't see in ourselves.
https://scottjeffrey.com/shadow-work/
Talk by Philosopher Alan Watts
ACCEPTING YOUR SHADOW SIDE - Alan Watts celebrates Carl Jung by Paul SIDDALL
YOUR SHADOW SIDE/ what the clergy failed to tell you. Alan Watts celebrates Carl Jung by telling us Carl Jung said our shadow side must be accepted not hidden. The cause of many of our problems stem from not accepting side. In the above excerpt, Alan Watts speaks about the time he met with Carl Jung.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ezVyg_I0uGo&feature=emb_title
Bonus:
10 Best Psychology Books to Learn About the Human Psyche
It has been said that there are three main ways to learn about human psychology: Read Greek mythology Read Carl Jung Observe others Of the three, observing others is the most powerful, but reading about the psyche helps inform our observations. There are at least three significant reasons to learn about psychology: Understand yourself and your motivations.
https://scottjeffrey.com/best-psychology-books/
How to Be an Adult: A Handbook on Psychological and Spiritual Integration
From Therapist David Richo, The book contains succint steps to work your fears, assertiveness and more.
How to Be an Adult
"In the hero stories, the call to go on a journey takes the form of a loss, an error, a wound, an unexplainable longing, or a sense of a mission. When any of these happens to us, we are being summoned to make a transition.
https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/978759.How_to_Be_an_Adult
Excerpts
EXCERPTS of How To Be An Adult, by David Richo
P. ix "In my years as a clinical psychologist, I have come to the conclusion that emotional and spiritual health is based on unconditional love, and that happy, mature people have somehow picked up the knack of being generous with their sympathies while still taking care of themselves.
https://eightysevenflorida.wordpress.com/2012/08/10/excerpts-of-how-to-be-an-adult-by-david-richo/
Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
CBT illuminates the links between thoughts, emotions, behaviors, and physical health and uses those connections to develop concrete plans for self-improvement
Audiobook course using real life examples
Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
Check out this great listen on Audible.com. Why is it so hard to lose weight, stop smoking, or establish healthy habits? Why do couples argue about the same issues over and over? Why do so many people lie awake at night, stricken with worry and anxiety?
https://www.audible.com/pd/Cognitive-Behavioral-Therapy-Audiobook/B00ZB7Q1RS
Techniques, tools and worksheets
25 CBT Techniques and Worksheets for Cognitive Behavioral Therapy
Even if you're relatively unfamiliar with psychology, chances are you've heard of cognitive behavioral therapy, commonly known as CBT . It's an extremely common type of talk therapy practiced around the world. If you've ever interacted with a mental health therapist, a counselor, or a psychiatry clinician in a professional setting, it's likely you've participated in CBT.
https://positivepsychology.com/cbt-cognitive-behavioral-therapy-techniques-worksheets/#cbt-worksheets
Podcasts
Hidden Brain
An entertaining mix of psychologists and personal stories
Hidden Brain
After a disaster happens, we want to know whether something could have been done to avoid it. Did anyone see this coming? Many times, the answer is yes. So why didn't the warnings lead to action? This week, we revisit a favorite 2018 episode about the psychology of warnings.
https://www.npr.org/podcasts/510308/hidden-brain
Youtube Channels
The Academy of Ideas
Short 10-15 minute videos on philosophy and psychology. Every video has a valuable insight
The Psychology of Self-Transformation
Become a Supporting Member (get access to member videos) â–º http://academyofideas.com/members/ === Patreon â–º https://www.patreon.com/academyofideas Carl Jung and The Shadow â–º https://gum.co/jung-shadow Bitcoin â–º 1P6ntukFENP1nvEf4bJNj3tsDEuiSyUFW6 Paypal â–º https://www.paypal.me/academyofideas === In this video, relying on the ideas of thinkers such as Carl Jung, Abraham Maslow and Ralph Waldo Emerson, we examine how we can change ourselves so as to live more fulfilling lives.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MQgC2nI6Wu4&list=PLAYxecbGotUwVUFzqVDdRxAyBXkdDoOhw
Nietzsche and Psychology: How To Become Who You Are
Become a Supporting Member (Join us with Paypal or Credit Card) Learn More here â–º http://academyofideas.com/members/ **Gain access to our growing library of Membership videos and courses!** ======== PayPal: https://www.paypal.me/academyofideas Amazon Affiliate Link: http://amzn.to/2kI9BuL Carl Jung and The Shadow: https://gum.co/jung-shadow ============================================ In this video we shed light on what it means to "become who you are", and in the process, explore some of Nietzsche's fascinating psychological insights.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfyCzLbcAvk
Performing Therapy On Yourself: Self-Knowledge and Self-Realization
Become a Supporting Member (Join us through Paypal or Patreon) Learn More here â–º http://academyofideas.com/members/ **Get access to Membership videos and courses!** === Carl Jung and The Shadow â–º https://gum.co/jung-shadow Patreon â–º https://www.patreon.com/academyofideas Bitcoin â–º 1P6ntukFENP1nvEf4bJNj3tsDEuiSyUFW6 Paypal â–º https://www.paypal.me/academyofideas === In a series of books, the 20th century psychoanalyst Karen Horney explored the idea that many people undermine their own well-being as a result of unconscious disturbances which influence their thoughts and behaviors.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHsJGkGP77I
Advice I've taken
The Big Five - I have done the UnderstandMyself test and it is now an integral part of my worldview. Overall it's a helpful framework
Shadow Work - I ask myself questions to help reveal my shadow, like "Why do I not like what this person is doing?", an example of projection.
posts.title: Understand Yourself: Resources To Increase Your Self Awareness
posts.desc: To understand yourself, take the big five personality test, and follow the featured shadow work guide
